channel.title: Living Impact Christian Centre (LICC)
channel.description: The messages of God's word from Living Impact Christian Centre.
channel.itunes:summary: The messages of God's word from Living Impact Christian Centre.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Living Impact Christian Centre (LICC)
channel.itunes:author: Pastor Wale Olasoji

item.title: Appreciating in life through the force of appreciation
item.itunes:author: Pastor Wale Olasoji
item.dc:creator: Pastor Wale Olasoji
item.description: We appreciate in life when we learn to appreciate people. When we appreciate people, we will appreciate God. In this message, Pastor Wale Olasoji will share with you the importance of appreciating God and the people He has put around you.
item.content:encoded: We appreciate in life when we learn to appreciate people. When we appreciate people, we will appreciate God. In this message, Pastor Wale Olasoji will share with you the importance of appreciating God and the people He has put around you.
item.itunes:subtitle: - Appreciating in life through the force of appreciation
item.itunes:summary: We appreciate in life when we learn to appreciate people. When we appreciate people, we will appreciate God. In this message, Pastor Wale Olasoji will share with you the importance of appreciating God and the people He has put around you.
item.itunes:keywords: LICC, Living Impact Christian Centre, Wale, Wale Olasoji, Pastor Wale, Pastor Olasoji

item.title: It is resurrection time!
item.itunes:author: Pastor Wale Olasoji
item.dc:creator: Pastor Wale Olasoji
item.description: Jesus is risen. Halleluyah! But that same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead can quicken and make alive anyone in who He lives. In this message, Pastor Wale Olasoji will share with you how you can move up from the memorial resurrection of Jesus (which is very necessary for our faith and hope) to an experienced resurrection for anything that has died in your life. Watch it and share with your friends. We will be glad to hear from you.
item.content:encoded: Jesus is risen. Halleluyah! But that same Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead can quicken and make alive anyone in who He lives. In this message, Pastor Wale Olasoji will share with you how you can move up from the memorial resurrection of Jesus (which is very necessary for our faith and hope) to an experienced resurrection for anything that has died in your life. Watch it and share with your friends. We will be glad to hear from you.

item.title: Commanding the Supernatural
item.itunes:author: Pastor Wale Olasoji
item.dc:creator: Pastor Wale Olasoji
item.description: In this message, Pastor Wale Olasoji explains how children of God can make supernatural things happen in their lives. You will be blessed. You can also share with your friends.
item.content:encoded: In this message, Pastor Wale Olasoji explains how children of God can make supernatural things happen in their lives. You will be blessed. You can also share with your friends.

item.title: Open My eyes Lord
item.itunes:author: Pastor Wale Olasoji
item.dc:creator: Pastor Wale Olasoji
item.description: When God opens our eyes, we begin to see properly. We begin to see what He wants us to see. In this message, Pastor Wale Olasoji is challenging you to pray to God and see this miracle happen to you. The result - testimonies.
item.content:encoded: When God opens our eyes, we begin to see properly. We begin to see what He wants us to see. In this message, Pastor Wale Olasoji is challenging you to pray to God and see this miracle happen to you. The result - testimonies.

item.title: Courage for the crown
item.itunes:author: Pastor Sola Onifade
item.dc:creator: Pastor Sola Onifade
item.description: Courage is an inspiration, its the quality of spirit that enables us to face danger of pain.How much courage do you have inside you?
item.content:encoded: Courage is an inspiration, its the quality of spirit that enables us to face danger of pain.How much courage do you have inside you?

item.description: We all need to prevail in all areas of our lives.Listen to this message to know more.

item.dc:creator: Pastor Idowu Oluwayinka
item.description: The Joy of the Lord is our strength says the Holy Bible.Be joyful always.

item.title: Getting Ready for the Coming of the Lord
item.itunes:author: Pastor Wale Olasoji
item.dc:creator: Pastor Wale Olasoji
item.description: Jesus will come back soon. He told us to be ready. He also warned that many will not be ready. Are you getting set for His soon return?
item.content:encoded: Jesus will come back soon. He told us to be ready. He also warned that many will not be ready. Are you getting set for His soon return?

item.title: Help From Above
item.itunes:author: Pastor Wale Olasoji
item.dc:creator: Pastor Wale Olasoji
item.description:
We need the help of God from time to time. If God does not help you, no one help can help you. But if God is there for your help, He can move those that did not want to help you to really help you.
In this message, your faith is going to be made stronger as you trust the source of true help - God.
item.content:encoded:
We need the help of God from time to time. If God does not help you, no one help can help you. But if God is there for your help, He can move those that did not want to help you to really help you.
In this message, your faith is going to be made stronger as you trust the source of true help - God.
